participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Energetic and competitive, Sophia thrives in athletic environments and enjoys discussing fitness and health.
participant_1.background: I am married. I enjoy sports such as running. I'm a vegetarian. My favorite color is blue. I am a woman.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Confident and humorous, Liam loves to share his experiences as an athlete and often engages in playful banter.
participant_2.background: I workout four hours a day. Gymnastics is my favorite sport. I'm a gold medalist Olympian. I love Italian food and garlic bread.

content.text: Good to see you! i like to run and watch sports
I'm actually too, because I'm gymnast
I am not a big fan of sports. i run a lot.
It's not about race, it's about race.
